website_summaries.verdict: For fans of color, shape, architecture, and Frank Lloyd Wright, this special jigsaw puzzle doesn't disappoint.
pros: Pieces are stamped with gold foil for extra shine
It's not meant for beginners, but experienced puzzle enthusiasts love the challenge it offers
cons: Though the art is beautiful, a few owners voice concern over the durability of the puzzle

customer_reviews.title: A total disappointment. Low quality
customer_reviews.text: This puzzle was very disappointing. The quality is very low. The pieces fit very loosely, so it is hard to tell for sure if you got the piece in the correct spot. The loose fitting pieces come apart very easily. I just barely bumped it with my arm and more than a fourth of the puzzle just came apart and I had to figure it all out again. The gold foil on the puzzle was very wrinkled and the print quality was very low. Too bad. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but inferior attention to quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful image of a FLW design. Thin backing stock. Some surface layer separation. Needs an additional clear-coat later to protect metallic ink from scuffing damage. I recommend this puzzle only to customers who plan to put it together only once and use puzzle glue to prevent ink from damage due to scratches. It won’t hold up to multiple uses.
customer_reviews.author: SSWINSJCA

customer_reviews.title: Galison puzzles are great with one exception, pieces are too thin
customer_reviews.text: Galison makes beautiful puzzles and I love this brand but they have started making the pieces more and very thin so when you open a new puzzle, you often find several bent pieces. They really should have better piece quality if they want to charge the prices they do for their puzzles. This one is gorgeous with the foil and I hope they make more like this. Pieces also fit tightly which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Peace

customer_reviews.title: Relatively easy to assemble with a bit of challenge
customer_reviews.text: I bought this puzzle because of the “two puzzles in one” factor but have only assembled it on the picture side. Relatively easy to assemble with a bit of challenge. The blueprint side has a lot of empty blue space so I anticipate that may be very challenging to put together. Galison makes really nice quality puzzles.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D.

customer_reviews.title: Galison is simply the best
customer_reviews.text: If you a are jigsaw puzzle addict, these are the best you can get. The best selection and highest quality construction we've found.
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed putting this puzzle together. It was challenging, but not beyond difficult. The gold pieces were slightly shiny, but not "foiled". Pieces were thick and good quality. I'd love to get another one from this line.
customer_reviews.author: rbeck1234

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 puzzles on 26 July to put together during the pandemic. The first one had a missing piece...499 out of 500 is great in baseball, not so much for a jigsaw puzzle. This one is a beautiful photograph but has THREE missing pieces...puzzles are time fillers...this one is a time waster, so it’s the last time I’ll order from this provider. (PS, I’ve been doing jigsaw puzzles for decades...I don’t lose pieces and didn’t think I needed to count the 500 pieces in advance).
customer_reviews.author: Bedford44

customer_reviews.title: Quality is very cheap
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get this puzzle but was disappointed once it arrived as the quality is very poor. The quality should match the price given $30 for a puzzle isn’t necessarily cheap but 50% of the pieces are falling apart, the layers of cardboard coming apart and the graphic peeling back. Such a bummer, what happened to quality control?!
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the pieces were damaged on the edges upon opening. I'm not sure that this will last through many uses because of this. It did go together well and it was pretty easy to tell if the pieces were a fit. Looks very nice when finished.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Eads

customer_reviews.title: Puzzle missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: We carefully assembled this puzzle with the intention of framing it but upon completion it was missing two key pieces, they are both gold foil pieces. Very disappointed ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Alise Chan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful representation
customer_reviews.text: Fallingwater is a national treasure, and this puzzle gave us hours of enjoyment. Not an easy puzzle, some pieces apparently fit, but were in the wrong place and had to be moved. We were so happy to finish that we left it on display in our family room for a month afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: John P Landis

customer_reviews.title: This was fun to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This was fun to assemble. Pros: all the pieces were there! Nice design. A lot of pieces, but do-able because you could sort and create the strips on the side until you could decide where they go. ActuaLly, kind of put itself together once several blocks or strips were assembled. Will be happy to pass this along to someone else to enjoy. Cons: thin, dusty, delaminating layers on some pieces.
customer_reviews.author: DesignerMom

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality and the seller has issues with delivery
customer_reviews.text: First, the puzzle is very poor quality for the price of it. The gold is not very shiny at all and there is not a lot of variation among the pieces sizes and shapes. Second, I experienced a lot of trouble with the delivery of this puzzle. The tracking showed that it was delivered to a different city since April 21st. On the 28th the puzzle was delivered to my address; however, discrepancies like this diminish my trust in this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry K. Walters

customer_reviews.title: This Puzzle is Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this puzzle to help me fill some of the long hours during our Coronavirus "stay at home" weeks. This puzzle is intricate and not for young children. For everyone else, this is a great challenging activity guaranteed to fill some of those long hours at home! I didn't add a photo because it isn't complete yet, but is better than halfway done. The pieces a easy enough to handle and very sturdy. The colors are vivid and the gold pieces are a nice touch. I highly recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Two wrong pieces
customer_reviews.text: We were very happy with this puzzle until we reached the end and realized that we had two pieces that did not fit the last two remaining spaces. We went back and recheck to make sure we hadn't mis-applied pieces elsewhere but we had not. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: HernReader

customer_reviews.title: Glorious in Every Way
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most beautiful puzzles I have ever seen. The colors are deep and rich, the pieces are intricately cut, and craftsmanship is lovely. I especially liked the metallic sheen. So pretty. This puzzle was a challenge to put together, but my husband and I loved every minute. The Galison Puzzle Company is our favorite. Springbok is also very good.
customer_reviews.author: C. Antonak

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece!
customer_reviews.text: Only received a 499 piece puzzle! Puzzle arrived yesterday and we put it together right away. Started with edges as usual and we were missing one edge piece. We thought we must have missed one and proceeded with the puzzle only to find that when we finished the puzzle that edge piece was still missing! Worst part is it is a double sided puzzle and we will be missing a piece of that puzzle too! Only option to get a replacement requires we pay to return the defective item! We are not going to pay for the return when I received an item with a missing part! We can’t even donate a puzzle with a missing piece!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Treude

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty picture, but really poorly made. There were two duplicate pieces in the box. Many of the pieces are the same shape, making it frustrating to assemble. A very cheaply made puzzle.
customer_reviews.author: Abiah83

customer_reviews.title: Drove me crazy BUT LOVED EVERY MINUTE OF IT!
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE: if you like jigsaw puzzles, this one (these two,) are highly recommended! Two fantastic puzzles in one-the museum is in beautiful glossy finish, suitable for framing. BUT WAIT!!! On the reverse side is the museum’s detailed architectural diagram in matte finish-really tough puzzle. It took me about 9 days to solve the diagram puzzle. Note: it takes lots of care and ingenuity to flip the puzzle over intact. You will thank yourself for buying this!
customer_reviews.author: Alan S. Nissenbaum

customer_reviews.title: Challenging and fun but the quality isn’t great
customer_reviews.text: Initially I thought this puzzle was amazing! The colors are crisp and glossy and the gold foil is beautiful! Once I started putting it together I noticed many peeling pieces and they really don’t “snap” together well. It falls apart very easily. It’s a fun, challenging design but I’m not impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful puzzle, but not cut very well
customer_reviews.text: Loved this puzzle, especially all that gold foil, but the pieces didn't seem to be cut that well. Upon opening the bag of pieces, there were pieces that were already peeling a bit and whole sections stuck together. Beautiful puzzle, but the cardboard they used wasn't that great. As for the design, it looked like it'd be fairly easy with the distinct patterns but the design of the cuts made it just difficult enough!
customer_reviews.author: Krystina B.A.

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: This box showed up unsealed with the lid ajar. The bag of pieces was sealed so I want too bothered, but the pieces are definitely made cheaply. Lots of paper dust comes off of them and several pieces are bent. It’s a cute puzzle with a neat theme, but wouldn’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Megan L.

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pieces
customer_reviews.text: Would have been a great puzzle, except it is missing pieces??? Finally went to build it and can't and now my return window has passed.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Gold colors stand out
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyable and easy color puzzle. Left it on table as placemat as the colors and the gold make an interesting pattern.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in Every Way
customer_reviews.text: I knew the puzzle itself was going to be gorgeous, it is Frank Lloyd Wright's architectural masterpiece Fallingwater after all (and the blueprint on the reverse is an excellent touch), but I was not expecting the packaging to be almost equally impressive. The box itself is sturdy, well designed, and gorgeously printed. Even the shipping box was notable in that it definitely appeared to have been custom made, fitting the puzzle's box perfectly and ensuring that it arrived in pristine condition. Not only would I recommend both this puzzle and this seller, but I can honestly say that they have earned a loyal customer.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Butalla

customer_reviews.title: This puzzle is BEAUTIFUL! Love the metallics
customer_reviews.text: This puzzle provided a lot of quarantine fun! The bright colors made it easy to see in dark spots of the house (we had to puzzle at night while the kids were sleeping), the patterns made it fun and easy-enough to spot and the metallic gold gave it a special touch that just made you happy. The final product was really pretty - so pretty that we even used puzzle glue so we can hang it on the wall (and we do NOT usually glue/hang puzzles, I'm a picky decorator). Money well-spent!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Devore

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece :(
customer_reviews.text: It’s a truly beautiful puzzle and extremely challenging, so after working on it for the last 6 weeks and discovering a piece is missing, was, well, heartbreaking. I live by myself and have a separate puzzle table. There is no way it was just lost. I even checked my vacuum canister. No dice. I’m even more bummed because I can’t exchange with friends....nobody wants a 1054 piece puzzle with 1053 pieces.  ̄\_(ツ)_/ ̄
customer_reviews.author: Eavan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but 1 Piece Missing
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful puzzle with gold foil pieces. Nice, larger pieces..thickness could be better but pieces fit together snugly. I took 1 star off because 1 piece was missing. Amazon wanted me to return puzzle which is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Leona Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great, creative puzzle
customer_reviews.text: My dad is a huge Frank Lloyd Wright and puzzle fan, so this was the perfect gift! He put together the photo side, the pieces fit together nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Christina L

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Would have been a beautiful puzzle if it hadn't been missing two pieces! Can't even donate it to anyone, now. What a letdown.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty design
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my teen daughter because I'm obsessed with Frank Lloyd Wright. She loved doing it (and she is legally blind but can see a little.) She said it was fun yet challenging and absolutely beautiful. She is in love with it. :). We're happy.
customer_reviews.author: munkymama

customer_reviews.title: Challenging
customer_reviews.text: What a gorgeous puzzle! Colors are so pure and vibrant. Matte metallic gold pieces a soothing contrast. My husband and I enjoyed every moment we spent putting this puzzle together. Didn’t take it down right away either.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Not too Easy
customer_reviews.text: Love the puzzle and the subject matter. It is making me a little crazy tho not easy at all. Much fun. Recommend for puzzle fans.
customer_reviews.author: Herv

customer_reviews.title: MISSING PIECE
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful puzzle. Very difficult. Not the best quality. However, we powered through it and enjoyed even though the pieces were a little "loose". We got to the end. Had 11 pieces. Nowhere for 4 of them. And one edge piece missing! VERY frustrating after a very difficult puzzle!
customer_reviews.author: debs

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This review is based upon just opening puzzle. Beautiful puzzle, visually. Pieces are very thin some of them are peeling and/or splitting. Not very substantial. If it wasn't such a hassle to go to the post office during this pandemic I would return this. Later on this same day. I am returning this item. To many pieces peeling.
customer_reviews.author: marg

customer_reviews.title: MISSING A PIECE!
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful, good quality puzzle. Quite the challenge, but after all that hard work, one piece is missing :-( Another friend also bought the same puzzle and was missing a piece also. Coincidence or bad QA?
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Challenging, but fun
customer_reviews.text: This puzzle was very challenging. It took me a few days longer to finish than I would normally spend on one puzzle, but I just could't stop. I highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Ray

customer_reviews.title: A quality challenge
customer_reviews.text: This puzzle is of high quality and very beautiful, enhanced by the gold for which we paid extra. It is quite the challenge to assemble, but extremely entertaining to watch the gorgeous patterns develop.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Piece missing.
customer_reviews.text: Seller did a great job. Package was in great condition and on time. The puzzle had a piece missing and wasn’t great quality. Love Fallingwater, grew up in the area and have toured it numerous times.
customer_reviews.author: Dunbar

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It's so pretty and high quality. It's also pretty challenging, there are so many lines and repetitiona of patterns that you really have to pay attention. A great puzzle to spend some quarantine hours on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Low Key Fun
customer_reviews.text: Came very quickly and has provided entertainment for the family. I love that it has two sides so once we complete one we can move to the other- great bargain. The picture is clear (and detailed!), all pieces were included and it is a unique product for those that like architecture, museums or modern history.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great Amazon Find
customer_reviews.text: We went to visit Falling Waters and my boyfriend saw this in the gift shop, mentioned her really liked it. I was able to get it for a steal on Amazon and surprise him for his birthday. He wanted to know how I snuck it to the car. Amazon for the win!!!
customer_reviews.author: Monica C

customer_reviews.title: Took a really long time to receive but puzzle is gorgeous.
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful puzzle. I dont know how others are dissatisfied. I have completed 4 puzzles so far during quarantine. Galison makes the most interesting and very high-quality puzzles. Cant wait to complete this!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ophir

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pieces
customer_reviews.text: Easier to put together since it is two sides and can be flipped over when you get to the tree pieces. I was disappointed that four pieces were missing,
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, challenging, riveting
customer_reviews.text: Loved this puzzle to (literally) distraction. A perfectly challenging and satisfying puzzle to engage with, and an incredible work of art to admire.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely satisfying feel and looks!
customer_reviews.text: This puzzle is perfection! I have bought and completed so many puzzles over the years but this one is hands down the most impressive! Beautifully crafted and a delight to interact with. I have genuinely oooed and aaahed over this puzzle so many times!
customer_reviews.author: protectlove

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful puzzle
customer_reviews.text: As a huge Frank Lloyd Wright fan, I really enjoyed this puzzle. It was challenging but in a good way! The puzzle is beautiful, almost frame able, especially with the shiny gold pieces. Recommend for any FLW fans and/or puzzlers!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn D.

customer_reviews.title: 500 pieces is just about right. Love the pic.
customer_reviews.text: My next puzzle was 1000 pieces. Just a bit tedious. This one is just right, for me. It's challenging without being over the top.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Opey

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: Had I known this was made in China, I would not have purchased this puzzle.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Double your fun
customer_reviews.text: Great way to get a second puzzle for the price of one. It did fool me though; I thought the side with all the scenery would be the harder side, turned out it was the floor plan side that got me groaning, but was still a great way to spend some quiet time alone)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, high quality
customer_reviews.text: Thick, solid pieces that lock together well. High quality, beautiful printing. Could seal, frame and display as a piece of art.
customer_reviews.author: Book Brain

customer_reviews.title: Challenging & Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Great challenge! Took 2 weeks from start to finish! It’s exquisite & we will be framing & hanging this beauty!
customer_reviews.author: BarbG

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect a gift quality box
customer_reviews.text: Yet again a gift for someone else arrived at less than gift quality. A corner of the box is crushed and the box has been taped with unsightly packing tape on all four sides. Fingers crossed the puzzle inside looks better than the packaging on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Wilbanks

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love this Puzzle!
customer_reviews.text: Great puzzle! Love the design and quality! You could frame this one! And it was substantially cheaper than other sellers!
customer_reviews.author: Avidreader

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and great quality puzzle.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful puzzle. Made me so happy that the foil is not cheaply made. It’s a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS GRIGAS

customer_reviews.title: work of art
customer_reviews.text: puzzle arrived on time and as described...complex and challenging...modern art worthy of framing when complete
customer_reviews.author: bill poznik

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: The puzzle was a good quality. It was a challenging one since there were so many different shades of green.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never saw a Two-sided Puzzle.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful puzzle--fit in with the other FLW gifts. Parts of the puzzle were mildly challenging but still fun with six people at one time working on it.
customer_reviews.author: John Shue

customer_reviews.title: High quality board and reproduction. Unique view of this ...
customer_reviews.text: High quality board and reproduction. Unique view of this FLW masterpiece. Not too difficult overall but has some challenging areas.
customer_reviews.author: Valyent

customer_reviews.title: Love a well made puzzle. Good colors, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This branch is very well made - have put several together and enjoy the modern theme
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Huntoon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful results Thwarted by Lab
customer_reviews.text: This was my dad’s bday gift during their Shelter in place, and as an architect, he loved it! My mom as well. Their lab ate a piece, so it was even more challenging...rated “D” for dog interference. Beautiful end result that he probably would have framed without our lab pup crushing that dream!
customer_reviews.author: Erin B

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Puzzle
customer_reviews.text: Haven't made the puzzle yet - it comes beautifully boxed and seems to be of good quality! Can't wait to build this one - may take a while!
customer_reviews.author: MKE PE Teach

customer_reviews.title: Great puzzle but arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Was excited for this to arrive and build it on the blueprint side since it’s double sided but there’s several pieces that are damaged (peeling or completely torn so I won’t be able to use the side I wanted to show after completed and framed.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. DG

customer_reviews.title: Frank Lloyd Wright Puzzle
customer_reviews.text: Fun puzzle for the quarantine. We enjoyed putting it together. Medium level of difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl D

customer_reviews.title: Bright Colors, Beautiful Design
customer_reviews.text: Great puzzle. I love just about everything about Frank Lloyd Wright. Bright colors, beautiful design, sturdy pieces, and challenging enough to take a few days to complete. Will buy more from Galison.
customer_reviews.author: angeljhawk

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very low quality. Every other piece is peeling. Wouldn’t recommend. The print is also way more full than pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Fun puzzle!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful gold leaf puzzle! Not too difficult to put together and interesting design.
customer_reviews.author: SGC

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and Beautiful Puzzle
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design. High quality printing + boxing, cardboard & cutting. Great colors esp. the gold. Worth the $20 I paid. Licensed by the Frank Lloyd Wright Foundation and it shows.
customer_reviews.author: Pol

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and difficult!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful puzzle. Very difficult, which we really liked. This would make a great gift. It’s beautiful when it’s fully out together.
customer_reviews.author: GDCReviews

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful puzzle. It took me months of working on it a little every day.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Miller

customer_reviews.title: Box wasn't sealed
customer_reviews.text: Excited to work on this puzzle. I was disappointed that the box didnt arrived sealed. But looks like are pieces are present.
customer_reviews.author: ruth a.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice quality puzzle
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality puzzle with strong colors and sturdy pieces. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Judy PM

customer_reviews.title: Difficult, artful, fun!
customer_reviews.text: A difficult adult puzzle. Still working on it!! Happy isolation!
customer_reviews.author: Philip Lebow

customer_reviews.title: Very well put together, no missing pieces.
customer_reviews.text: The gold foil is an excellent touch, and it's a pretty challenging puzzle to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and challenging puzzle
customer_reviews.text: This is one tough puzzle! Still not finished. But it is challenging and I have been enjoying the challenge.
customer_reviews.author: legendsmom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful puzzle
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful puzzle. Pieces were all present, in good shape, and fit easily together.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Double The Fun
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it as a gift. Was very well received. First double sided puzzle this fervent puzzle doer has ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen S. Berger-smith

customer_reviews.title: Stunning puzzle
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful puzzle that looks just like the photo. Makes a great gift for those who like to put assembled photos on their wall as "art."
customer_reviews.author: Jane Given

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL PUZZLE WITH JUST THE RIGHT AMOUNT OF CHALLENGE
customer_reviews.text: This puzzle was so fun to put together during Covid Quarentine. Just the right size and just the right challenge and so satisfying to finish. Great puzzle for my husband and I to work on together. I love the gold pieces!
customer_reviews.author: CLK

customer_reviews.title: Very challenging puzzle
customer_reviews.text: Very challenging. A couple of pieces don't fit quite right, but I haven't finished it yet, so they may be in the wrong place.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Blythe

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and well-made Puzzle!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made puzzle - and beautiful. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Meir

customer_reviews.title: He loved this puzzle
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend who’s an avid puzzle person. He loved this puzzle!
customer_reviews.author: Carsan

customer_reviews.title: Stay at Home Gift
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Delivered on time. Was a gift for "stay at home". Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: L.G.

customer_reviews.title: Great puzzle and content.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful puzzle and it was fun to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Pieces!
customer_reviews.text: Our puzzle came with 1000 pieces but 11 of them were wrong and the puzzle could not be completed. I have enjoyed many Galison puzzles but now will think twice before buying another.
customer_reviews.author: g smith

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: The puzzle looks beautiful and arrived promptly and in excellent condition. I have no hands-on experience with it as it is intended to be a gift. I believe that the recipient will be delighted with it.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Loved this puzzle
customer_reviews.text: This 1,000 piece puzzle took me a little longer to put together than others, but I enjoyed following a line of pieces and then eventually figuring out where they fit. Great quality and I liked it so much when done I'm actually thinking of gluing and hanging it!
customer_reviews.author: Steven G. Randall

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Puzzle
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy pieces. We love the famous Frank Lloyd Wright Depiction of the Saguaro. Will keep this puzzle in the family. The foil pieces were a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: hillary

customer_reviews.title: Too hard for us.
customer_reviews.text: The colors were very muted as the house is in the shade. WE are avid puzzle players but this was to tough for us! We put it back in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryll McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Been there and did that!
customer_reviews.text: Already completed puzzle...both sides! The colors side was easier. Some pieces fit but later it was found another fit better! Challenging and fun puzzle! Gave this one to a relative as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Katie123

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.  Beautiful puzzle
customer_reviews.text: A winter puzzle has become a tradition. This Frank Lloyd Wright Saguaro Cactus and Forms Foil Stamped 1000 Piece Puzzle is sturdy and beautiful! A joy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: D. King

customer_reviews.title: Bent and missing pieces!
customer_reviews.text: The puzzle is gorgeous but so many of the pieces are bent AND one piece is missing! It's like I bought a used puzzle. Super disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: This will be a great one for securing and putting on the wall
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my daughter that loves puzzling. This will be a great one for securing and putting on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE——-Missing puzzle pieces
customer_reviews.text: If I could give 0 stars I would. I spent hours putting together this 1000 piece puzzle only to find there were 5 pieces missing. What a joke!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Jamron

customer_reviews.title: Good pandemic past time.
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed this puzzle as a good pandemic past time. Challenging & engrossing. Many patterns/colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amity

customer_reviews.title: PICTURE DOESN'T MATCH
customer_reviews.text: THE PICTURE ON THE BOX AND THE PICTURE ON THE SHEET ENCLOSED DO NOT SHOW COMPLETE PUZZLE. THE EDGES ARE NOT SHOWN AND SOME ARE INCORRECT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun to do
customer_reviews.text: We are missing one piece! It is key to the puzzle. We would like to have the puzzle replaced. Upon receipt, we will find the one missing piece and return it to you. Re-doing the puzzle is not a good option. Please advise.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Great puzzle!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Dad for Christmas and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Tkat3178

customer_reviews.title: Frank Lloyd Wright puzzle winner!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this well made puzzle, it is of high quality and would be worth framing!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Winiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful puzzle!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful puzzle! Challenging but doable, well packaged. Can’t wait to frame it!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline G.

product_meta.title: Galison Frank Lloyd Wright Saguaro Forms and Cactus Flowers Gold Foil Puzzle, 1,000 Pieces, 20”x27” – Fun, Relaxing and Challenging – Gold Foil Added to Image Brings New Flavor to Iconic Piece of Art
product_meta.description: Style:Saguaro Forms and CactusLovers of art, architecture and challenging puzzles will be excited about this Galison 1,000-Piece Frank Lloyd Wright Saguaro Forms and Cactus Flowers Gold Foil Puzzle. Bringing a new flavor to an iconic piece of art, the gold foil-stamped puzzle pieces help the famed architect’s design shine and guides you through this puzzle. The shapes, patterns and colors will bring joy and relaxation to amateur and pro puzzlers alike. The bright, colorful and eye-catching finished jigsaw puzzle measures 20” x 27”. The attractive and sturdy 8.25” x 11.25” x 2” foil-stamped storage box is an ideal place to keep pieces safe, together, and free from damage. Also makes a great gift! For over 40 years, Galison has worked to bring art into everyday life with award-winning collections of stationery and gift products with a focus on collaborating with new artists and illustrators. Originally designed as a magazine cover, Saguaro Forms and Cactus Flowers is one of iconic architect Frank Lloyd Wright’s most popular designs. The box includes an insert with information about Wright and his amazing artwork.
feature_bullets: 1,000-PIECE PUZZLE: A fun challenge for adults and families, the 1,000-piece jigsaw puzzle features Frank Lloyd Wright’s iconic Saguaro Forms and Cactus Flowers artwork. The bright, colorful and eye-catching finished puzzle measures 20” x 27”.
FOIL-STAMPED: The gold foil-stamped puzzle pieces help the famed architect’s design shine and guides you through this puzzle bringing joy and relaxation to amateur and pro puzzlers alike.

STURDY STORAGE BOX: The attractive and sturdy 8.25” x 11.25” x 2” foil-stamped storage box is an ideal place to keep pieces safe, together, and free from damage. Also makes a great gift for a fan of puzzles, art, architecture, or Frank Lloyd Wright!

PUZZLE ARTWORK: Originally designed as a magazine cover, Saguaro Forms and Cactus Flowers is one of iconic architect Frank Lloyd Wright’s most popular designs. The box includes an insert with information about Wright and his amazing artwork.

BRINGING ART INTO EVERYDAY LIFE: For over 40 years, Galison has worked to bring art into everyday life with award-winning collections of stationery and gift products with a focus on collaborating with new artists and illustrators.
